info.name: Scratch Dark (For when you're tired of white)
info.description: Many people experience issues when visiting websites with bright white backgrounds. It causes additional eye-strain and can be very bright at night. This style changes the Scratch website's color scheme to a darker colour, more tolerable colour.
info.additionalInfo: This style is based off PullJosh's Green Scratch, with modifications by me. KNOWN FAULTS • The background is still white. How the heck do you change that? • Buttons are still green • Forums don't display too well • Usernames under project title are hard to see • CSS is very messy and unorganized. I don't recommend trying to build off it • Studios and remix side-bars are still white Everything mentioned above will be fixed in future updates. UPDATES LOG • September 6th 2014, v.1.0 - Initial Public Release
